patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.name: Memorizable Gensokyo
patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.landin: A mod about the maid and the touhou project.$(br2)Thanks to Snownee for help in coding. $(br)Thanks to Succinum, Pajinyi, ZeniCrow, Tian_mi, Paulzzh, Yuriscat and other artists for producing excellent models and textures.$(br)Thanks to Verclene, the author of little maid mob mod.
patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.catego: Introduced the basic functions of the maid
Introduce the overview content of this mod
patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entrie: Backpack

The backpack can be used to expand the inventory of the maid. It can be applied by holding the backpack and right-click on the maid. The backpack has three levels. $(br2)Use the shears to remove the maid's backpack.
Maid with a small backpack.
Item Magnet
A bauble that can expand the pickup range. $(br2)After being equipped, the maid's pickup range of items, arrows, experience orb, and power points will be greatly increased.
Maid Base

There are many basic functions that maids are able to perform, such as:$(li)By default, the maid will actively pick up items, arrows and experience orbs around her. The main GUI has a button to switch pick up mode;$(li)By default, the maid will always follow the player.

$(li)Shift right-clicking maid with an empty hand can switch sitting mode. In sitting mode, maid doesn't do anything, including avoiding danger.$(li)When the maid ride on other entities, Shift right-clicking with an empty hand can dismount them.$(li)The player can use a golden apple or potion on a maid by right-clicking them while holding the item.

$(li)The experience picked up by the maid can be converted into an Bottle o' Enchanting if the player right-click the maid while holding a bottle.$(li)The maid can equip the skull and render model of it.$(li)Right-click the maid with an empty nameplate, and you can name it directly.$(li)When maid holds the tempt item for animals, she is able to attract surrounding animals.
$(li)Creepers will avoid maids.
Maid Bauble

This mod provides several baubles that can be triggered to protect maids under certain conditions, they need to be place in the bauble inventory.$(li)Ultramarine Orb Elixir: Can be used 6 times to avoid a maid's death.

$(li)Protect Bauble: When the maid receives the corresponding damage, the damage event is canceled.$(li)Nimble Fabric: When a maid equipped with this bauble is hit by projectile, her behavior will be exactly the same as the enderman.
Maid Config
This mod adds a lot of configuration for maids. You can set some attributes of the maids, and limit the maximum number of maids that can be tamed by the player.
Maid Skin

The maids' skin is completely customizable, you can easily change the maids' skin in game.$(br2)you can also add a third-party resource pack to increase the style of the maid's skin.$(br2)Use the $(l:https://blockbench.net/)Blockbench$(/l) software to easily create your own maid skin resource pack, and place the package in the $(#f00)tlm_custom_pack$() folder under the game directory.
Click the button in the picture to open the maid skin GUI.
Maid Sound
You can make custom sound resources packs to replace or expand the maid's sound effects.
Click the button in the picture to open the maid sound GUI.
Maid Task

When you open a maid's GUI, you can see a maid task button, click it to switch the maid's task.$(br2)You can also click the schedule button to switch the maid's schedule so that it can work, rest or sleep in different time periods.
Click the button in the lower right corner of the image to switch pictures
Mute Bauble
After equipped with this bauble, the maid will become very quiet.
Naming Eggs

A specially named maid can display a special model.$(br2)By default, a maid named with $(#ff0000)=>id$() can become the player skin model corresponding to that id.$(br2)The maid resource pack can also add custom model eggs, even SHA1 encrypted model eggs.
Maid with the name $(#ff0000)=>Notch$().
Spawn Maid

The way to get a maid is very special and needs to be done through a multi-blocks altar.$(br2)Since the recipe is likely to change in the future, please check the JEI altar label.$(br2)After the maid is successfully spawned in a multi-blocks altar, you will get a cake box wrapped with the maid, just right-click the cake box to open it.

You need to right-click three times to trigger different opening stages, and finally the cake box will disappear.$(br2)You will need a cake to tame the maid. the taming items can be changed in the configuration file.$(br2)The tamed maid is almost identical to a vanilla pet, and you can right-click to open her GUI.
Substitute Jizo
Substitute jizo is a creative mode item that can be set to invincible mode when right-click the maid.
Maid Home
When the home mode button is clicked, the maid will record the current pos and move within 8 range around it. (the range can be modified in the config file)
Film
The maid will drop a film after death, and the film can be used in altar to reborn the maid.$(br2)Film will not be destroyed by fire or lava.
Gap

A bauble that can transport items. $(br2)You can right-click chest with the gap to mark it, then open its GUI to make some settings, and finally place it in the maid's bauble inventory. $(br2)After this, the maid will take out/deposit the specified items "wirelessly" from the chest.
You can use the compass to see the maid's home pos
Snowball Fight
When the maid is on the snow and in idle task, the maid throws snowballs at the player or other maids
Chat Bubbles
The maid occasionally displays several chat bubbles, which can also be customized through model packs
Chisel & Statues
Right-click the clay with a chisel can make statues of different sizes. Currently supports 1x1x1, 1x1x2, 2x2x4, 3x3x6 sizes.
The player holds a photo of the maid in offhand, the mainhand holds the chisel, then right-clicks the lower left corner of the multi-block structure to engrave the maid in the photo.
Garage Kit
The fire roasted 1x1 size statue can be converted into it.
Shrine Lamp
The shrine lamp is a good decoration and has certain practical functions. Right click on the upper part of the shrine lamp to open the GUI, store the player's power point.

It also can select effect, then will consume power points to bring the effect to the surrounding range of maids.$(br2)The shrine lamp is also a good tool for automatically collecting power point. It can automatically collect power point within 6 blocks and store them.
Trumpet

A tool to recall the maid, right-click to use. $(br2)$(4)$(l)Note: This item can only recall the maid on the loaded chunk. From a technical point of view, there is currently NO ANY WAY to recall the maid on the unload chunk.
Custom Cushion

The custom cushion is a purely decorative item, placed directly on the ground by right-click, and shift left-click can destroy it, right-click to sit, shift right-click to open the GUI to switch the cushion model.

Some of the cushions can sit directly when the maid is close, shift right-click to the maid can leave the cushion.$(br2)The cushion model can also be completely customized, or you can quickly add a custom model through the model package.
Command
$(#f00)/tlm$(): This is the command provided by the mod$(br2)You can use it to set power, maid num, or reload the model package.
Extinguisher
The items used with the maid extinguishing mode and cannot be used by players.
Maid Bed

The player can sleep, and naturally the maid can also sleep. During sleep schedule, the maid will to look for the surrounding bed to sleep.$(br2)The sleeping maid will no longer be attacked by hostile creatures, and the maid's GUI cannot be opened at this time.
Maid sleeping in bed.
Power Point
Right-click is thrown out, can drop the power point entity.$(br2)You can find the power point of the item form in the dungeon loot chest.
Camera & Photo

Carry a maid across dimensions or at a distance is a hassle, and the camera is designed for this purpose. $(br2)Just take a photo of your maid with camera and turn it into a photo, then hold the photo and right click on a block to release it.
Model Switcher
Used in creative mode, mainly designed for servers, can be used to display maid models

First you need to right-click on the maid with the block in your hand, then place it on the ground and open the GUI to set the model you want to show.$(br2)Then enter the redstone signal on its left and right sides to switch the maid model.
Chair Show
When holding the item and pressing the sneak button, all chair will show the collision box
Gohei And Danmaku
The gohei is a normal melee weapon.$(br2)The maid holding a gohei will shoot danmaku in danmaku task.
The gohei is an important tool for building a multi-block altar.
Multi-Blocks Altar

The altar is the multi-block structure required for the craft of this mod.$(br2)The altar's recipes can be obtained through JEI, and the craft also requires player's $(l:overview/power_point)power point$().
Use the $(l:overview/gohei_and_danmaku)gohei$() to right click on the red wool in the center left of the fourth layer to build the altar.
Multi-block Altar

You can place the item by right-clicking on the top of the six oak pillars of the altar. You can remove the item by empty-handed right-clicking.$(br2)When the item is completely placed and the player's power point is enough, altar can trigger craft.$(br2)The craft is interrupted due to lack of power, and after obtaining enough power, right click again to re-trigger the craft.
Power Point

The power point is an important resource for this mod, which is obtained by killing the $(l:overview/world_spawn#fairy)maid fairy$().$(br2)Can be used for $(l:overview/multiblocks_altar)altar$() crafting.

When you holds the $(l:overview/gohei_and_danmaku)gohei$(), you can see your power point number in the upper left corner of the game screen. $(br2)The maximum power point is 5, and more than this number power point no longer increases. $(br2)The maid can pick up power point, and will repair all items on her inventory that have the $(5)Mending$() enchantment.
Touhou Project
The Touhou Project is a Japanese doujin game series by Sole Team Shanghai Alice member ZUN that specializes in Shoot 'em Ups.
Touhou Wiki
World Spawn

This mod adds one mobs. $(br2)The looting of mob are important crafting ingredient.$(br2)The chance of spawn hostile creatures in this mod can be modified in the configuration file. When set to 0, these monsters can be prohibited from spawn.
Spawn in the any biome at night, it will fly and shoot danmaku to attack players or maids.
Make Custom Model

Making a custom model pack is very simple, all you need is Blockbench software, Blockbench is a free and open source software that is easy to use. $(br2)The custom model also supports Bedrock Edition animations, as well as a rich set of molang variables.
I specially designed a plugin for making model pack for Blockbench, visit the link below to learn how to install the plugin.
Open Link
Download Custom Model
You can find the model pack download button at the bottom of the maid GUI.

Click it to open the download GUI & choose to download the model pack you like.$(br2)The model packs are all made by players. If you also want to publish your custom model pack, you can click the button below to join our Discord group and submit your model pack.
Discord Link
Vanilla Change
We modified the slime model to the yukkuri.
We also changed the textures of Experience Orbs, Bottle of Experience, and Totem of Undying. $(br2)These can all be turned off in the configuration file.
